All Implemented Interfaces:
SelfRendering
public abstract class Robot
extends GameEntity

a Robot as per traditional architecture, with... * Sensors that Sense * The method Think(double timeDelta) to be overriden to Think * MechanicalDevices that Act

Author:
Gurwinder Gulati

Parameters:
physics - PhysicsModel applied to the Robot

image - Image used to draw the Robot on the screen
bounds - Collision boundaries of the Robot

Think

protected abstract void Think(double timeDelta)
OVERRIDE THIS METHOD. Processes sensory data and acts upon it. Reasons, Behaves and Remembers

Parameters:
timeDelta - Time since last update
